item.description:
We plan to join several other meetups at the 4th Annual Portsmouth Cocktail Competition
on Sunday June 6th from 4pm-8 pm!

The meetup will be one to attend as the cocktail competition mixes fun and business networking in a great downtown Portsmouth event.

The Competition:
Ten downtown Portsmouth restaurants will offer mini martini's as they compete for the Best Signature Cocktail of Portsmouth. Your ticket includes :

cocktail tastings at all participating restaurants
souvenir shot glass
event map
social business card device
entrance to the wrap up party!


Networking:
Each attendee recieves a social business card device with their ticket purchase.
You pre load your device with all your social networking and business information.
At the event you connect with others and get their contact information be merely touching
devices(or poking as it is often called) Get hundreds of contact information while enjoying
a great event!

Purchase a ticket today and join us at the meetup!Click here for tickets and event details!
item.name: 4th Annual Portsmouth Cocktail Competition features networking
